GSD.product_version: versions from v2.6.15 to before v4.14.283
GSD.description:
um: Fix out-of-bounds read in LDT setup

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v4.14.283 by commit ef1dc929a1e5fa1b2d842256db9fb8710d3be910, it was introduced in version v2.6.15 by commit 858259cf7d1c443c836a2022b78cb281f0a9b95e. For more details please see the references link.

OSV.summary: um: Fix out-of-bounds read in LDT setup
